com.binance4j.strategy.trading

Class BaseTradingStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.binance4j.strategy.trading.BaseTradingStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TradingStrategy

    public abstract class BaseTradingStrategy
extends Object
implements TradingStrategy
    The abstract implementation of TradingStrategy any trading strategy should inherit.
